title: Diamond Cluster Studs - Contemporary Kempu Style
features: Cluster setting that maximizes diamond brilliance. Petal-like design arrangement, offering a modern take on traditional Kempu inspired motifs. Secure push-back closure.
colors: Brilliant white diamonds against a polished white gold setting.
occasions: or as a cherished gift. Suitable for engagements
description: Exceptional diamond brilliance and fire, created by the meticulous cluster setting.  The subtle Kempu-inspired design adds a touch of South Indian heritage to a contemporary style. Comfortable and lightweight for all-day wear. A versatile piece that enhances any outfit.
